packageKey1.title: Just Supporting
packageKey1.description: Your excited about the game "Waking up!", and want to give a small donation to support our project.  Every little bit counts.  Thank you!

packageKey2.title: 1 Book
packageKey2.description: You will receive one copy of "Making Waking Up"!

packageKey3.title: 1 Copy of "Waking Up!"
packageKey3.description: You will receive one copy of the game "Waking Up!" for Windows, macOS, and Linux.

packageKey4.title: Producer for "Waking Up!"
packageKey4.description: Your name will appear in the opening credits as one of the producers of "Waking Up".  In addition, you will receive the items from all other packages.
